item.title: The overlooked: an analysis of the sample population of Toronto's 2017 multilingual policy survey
item.description: The R Markdown file for this post, including all the codes can be found here on my GitHub. Abstract In 2017, the City of Toronto conducted a survey on its multilingual information policy. In this article I will analyse two demographic groups that shows unusal patterns: seniors, especially those who are over 85, and Bengali speakers, who are overrepresented in the survey results, and how they responded to the survey.
